title: Fwee!
author: verias
text:
Sorry for the late update. Rough times for all around the office here.

Looks like perhaps Theresa and Chrys both found something useful! What do you guys think?

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text: Hang on, is that a Power Glove!?

replies.author: Baffled*Guest*
replies.text: Colour me ignorant, but a green plant growing without light or water? Then it would neither be growing, nor a green plant. Call it fridge logic.
